ValidationRule.description: Validates GSTIN format: 2-digit state code + 10-char PAN + 1 entity code + Z + 1 check digit. Example: 27AABCU9603R1ZM
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid GSTIN format. Expected format: 2 digits + 5 letters + 4 digits + 1 letter + 1 alphanumeric + Z + 1 alphanumeric (e.g., 27AABCU9603R1ZM)
